name: modxcms/teleport
description: An extensible scripting and packaging toolkit for MODX Revolution

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Require this with ^2.0 version constraint to enable registration of an S3 stream wrapper.
suggest.ext-libevent: It is critical to have this or ext-ev if you plan to use the server or endpoint listener.
suggest.ext-ev: It is critical to have this or ext-libevent if you plan to use the server or endpoint listener.
suggest.ext-posix: If running teleport from a user different from the php process, it will need to switch to that user.
